amendment.description: To require a report on encroachment issues affecting Utah Test and Training Range, Utah.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3373 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3373 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Bennett. (consideration: CR S7152-7160) To require a report on encroachment issues affecting Utah Test and Training Range, Utah.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3373 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3373 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Bennett.
